---
title: "DiamondPlot"
format: html
---

## 

```{r}
#| echo: true

library(ggplot2)

diamonds |>
  ggplot(aes(x=carat, y=price, color=cut)) +
  geom_point() +
  ggtitle(label = sprintf('%s', Sys.time())) +
  theme_minimal()

```

The `echo: false` option disables the printing of code (only output is displayed).
